column1: Computer Science for Cyber Security - PgDip/PgCert/MSc
column3: School of Engineering, Computing and Mathematics
column5: Our MSc Computer Science for Cyber Security course will equip you with the advanced technical skills needed to produce modern secure systems. The course builds on knowledge gained from your first degree. It is for recent graduates and those with substantial experience in the computing industry.Our teaching staff have a wide range of expertise. We put an emphasis on live projects, alongside group work modelled on industry standard working patterns.You will use industry standard tools in our security, server and networking laboratories. These labs provide a safe space for you to practice both offensive and defensive security techniques.
column7: Home (UK) full time - Masters £8,700; Diploma £7,700; Certificate £4,350 Home (UK) part time - £4,350 International full time - £17,200
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time (MSc), 6 months full time, 18 months part time (PgDip), 3 months full time, 6 months part time (PgCert)
